SEARCH
Package display.medicalRecords

Class DiagnosisDisplay

java.lang.Object
display.medicalRecords.DiagnosisDisplay
public class DiagnosisDisplay extends Object
The DiagnosisDisplay class provides various displays and menus for managing and interacting with diagnoses related to patients. It includes functionalities for adding, viewing, updating, and displaying diagnosis records.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    addDiagnosisDisplay(Patient patient, Doctor doctor)
    Displays the menu to add a new diagnosis for a patient by a doctor.
    static void
    displayAllDiagnosisOfPatient(Patient patient)
    Displays all diagnosis records of a patient without a doctor specified, useful for viewing history in a general context.
    static void
    updateDiagnosisDisplay(Patient patient, Doctor doctor)
    Main display for updating diagnosis, showing all diagnosis records for a patient and allowing the doctor to select a specific diagnosis to update.

      public DiagnosisDisplay()

  • Method Details

    • addDiagnosisDisplay

      public static void addDiagnosisDisplay(Patient patient, Doctor doctor) throws utils.exceptions.PageBackException
      Displays the menu to add a new diagnosis for a patient by a doctor.
      Parameters:
      patient - the patient receiving the diagnosis
      doctor - the doctor providing the diagnosis
      Throws:
      utils.exceptions.PageBackException - if an error occurs or user opts to go back

    • updateDiagnosisDisplay

      public static void updateDiagnosisDisplay(Patient patient, Doctor doctor) throws utils.exceptions.PageBackException
      Main display for updating diagnosis, showing all diagnosis records for a patient and allowing the doctor to select a specific diagnosis to update.
      Parameters:
      patient - the patient whose diagnosis records are displayed
      doctor - the doctor making the updates
      Throws:
      utils.exceptions.PageBackException - if an error occurs or the user opts to go back

    • displayAllDiagnosisOfPatient

      public static void displayAllDiagnosisOfPatient(Patient patient) throws utils.exceptions.PageBackException
      Displays all diagnosis records of a patient without a doctor specified, useful for viewing history in a general context.
      Parameters:
      patient - the patient whose diagnosis records are displayed
      Throws:
      utils.exceptions.PageBackException - if an error occurs or no records are found
